landing.title: NARA React Boilerplate
landing.subtitle: A fast, opinionated starter for building full-stack React apps
landing.description: Built with React Router v7, TypeScript, Cloudflare Workers, and modern tooling. Designed with focus on type safety, performance, and developer ergonomics.

hero.title: NARA Boilerplate
hero.subtitle: The Full-Stack React Boilerplate That Actually Ships
hero.description: Stop wasting time on boilerplate setup. Start with a production-ready foundation built for developers who ship fast and ship often.
hero.statusText: From git clone to production in 5 minutes

features.title: Features
features.sectionDescription: Built with focus on type safety, performance, and developer ergonomics

typeSafety.title: Type Safety
typeSafety.description: End-to-end TypeScript coverage with proper route typing and strict type checking throughout the entire stack.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Modern tooling with Vite and Bun for lightning-fast builds, plus Cloudflare edge deployment for global performance.

developerErgonomics.title: Developer Ergonomics
developerErgonomics.description: Opinionated setup that just works. Pre-configured tooling, testing, and development environment for maximum productivity.

versatile.title: Versatile
versatile.description: Flexible architecture designed to fit the majority of project ideas, from MVPs to production applications.

features.typeScriptDesc: Full type safety with TypeScript support
features.databaseDesc: Drizzle ORM with Cloudflare D1 integration
features.uiDesc: Beautiful components with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui

gettingStarted.title: From Zero to Production
gettingStarted.description: Follow these simple steps to get your NARA application up and running

clone.title: Clone the Repository
clone.description: Get the latest version of NARA boilerplate

install.title: Install Dependencies
install.note: Package manager only supports Bun for now

database.title: Set Up Database
database.note: Creates the SQLite database for development

start.title: Start Development
start.note: Your app will be available at http://localhost:5173

builtForDevelopers.title: Everything You Need, Nothing You Don't

configHeadaches.label: Config headaches
configHeadaches.description: Just works out of the box

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Perfect for open source projects and learning

features.mustOpenSource: Must open source if deployed publicly

commercial.title: Commercial Edition
commercial.description: Great for closed-source and production SaaS projects

features.noOpenSource: No need to open source your changes

techStack.title: Modern Tech Stack
techStack.description: Carefully selected technologies that work seamlessly together
